verses.verse: And Saul, <S%G4569><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> breathing <S%G1709><s%> out threatenings <S%G547><s%> and slaughter <S%G5408><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> went <S%G4334><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%>

And desired <S%G154><s%> of him letters <S%G1992><s%> to Damascus <S%G1154><s%> to the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> that if <S%G1437><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> way, <S%G3598><s%> whether <S%G5037><s%> they were men <S%G435><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> he might bring <S%G71><s%> them bound <S%G1210><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And as he journeyed, <S%G4198><s%> he came <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> Damascus: <S%G1154><s%> and suddenly <S%G1810><s%> there shined <S%G4015><s%> round <S%G4015><s%> about <S%G4015><s%> him a light <S%G5457><s%> from heaven: <S%G3772><s%>

And he fell <S%G4098><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Saul, <S%G4569><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> you me?

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you, Lord? <S%G2962><s%> And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you persecute: <S%G1377><s%> it is hard <S%G4642><s%> for you to kick <S%G2979><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the pricks. <S%G2759><s%>

And he trembling <S%G5141><s%> and astonished <S%G2284><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you have me to do? <S%G4160><s%> And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Arise, <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and it shall be told <S%G2980><s%> you what <S%G5101><s%> you must <S%G1163><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

And the men <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> journeyed <S%G4922><s%> with him stood <S%G2476><s%> speechless, <S%G1769><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> a voice, <S%G5456><s%> but seeing <S%G2334><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man. <S%G3367><s%>

And Saul <S%G4569><s%> arose <S%G1453><s%> from the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and when his eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened, <S%G455><s%> he saw <S%G991><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man: <S%G3762><s%> but they led <S%G5496><s%> him by the hand, <S%G5496><s%> and brought <S%G1521><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>
And he was three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> sight, <S%G991><s%> and neither <S%G3756><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> drink. <S%G4095><s%>

And there was a certain <S%G5100><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus, <S%G1154><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias; <S%G367><s%> and to him said <S%G2036><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in a vision, <S%G3705><s%> Ananias. <S%G367><s%> And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am here, Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said to him, Arise, <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the street <S%G4505><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Straight, <S%G2117><s%> and inquire <S%G2212><s%> in the house <S%G3614><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> for one called <S%G3686><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> of Tarsus: <S%G5018><s%> for, behold, <S%G2400><s%> he prays, <S%G4336><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> by many <S%G4183><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> how <S%G3745><s%> much <S%G3745><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> he has done <S%G4160><s%> to your saints <S%G40><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem: <S%G2419><s%>

And here <S%G5602><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> to bind <S%G1210><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that call <S%G1941><s%> on your name. <S%G3686><s%>

But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Go <S%G4198><s%> your way: for he is a chosen <S%G1589><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> to me, to bear <S%G941><s%> my name <S%G3686><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and kings, <S%G935><s%> and the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>
For I will show <S%G5263><s%> him how <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things he must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake.

And Ananias <S%G367><s%> went <S%G565><s%> his way, and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house; <S%G3614><s%> and putting <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him said, <S%G2036><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> even Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that appeared <S%G3700><s%> to you in the way <S%G3598><s%> as you came, <S%G2064><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> me, that you might receive <S%G308><s%> your sight, <S%G308><s%> and be filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> there fell <S%G634><s%> from his eyes <S%G3788><s%> as it had been scales: <S%G3013><s%> and he received <S%G308><s%> sight <S%G308><s%> immediately, <S%G3916><s%> and arose, <S%G450><s%> and was baptized. <S%G907><s%>

And when he had received <S%G2983><s%> meat, <S%G5160><s%> he was strengthened. <S%G1765><s%> Then <S%G1161><s%> was Saul <S%G4569><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> with the disciples <S%G3101><s%> which were at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>
And straightway <S%G2112><s%> he preached <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> that he is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But all <S%G3956><s%> that heard <S%G191><s%> him were amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and said; <S%G3004><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> he that destroyed <S%G4199><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G1941><s%> on <S%G1941><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> for that intent, that he might bring <S%G71><s%> them bound <S%G1210><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests? <S%G749><s%>

But Saul <S%G4569><s%> increased <S%G1743><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> in strength, <S%G1743><s%> and confounded <S%G4797><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> dwelled <S%G2730><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus, <S%G1154><s%> proving <S%G4822><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is very <S%G846><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And after <S%G5613><s%> that many <S%G2425><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> were fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> took <S%G4823><s%> counsel <S%G4823><s%> to kill <S%G337><s%> him:

But Barnabas <S%G921><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> him, and brought <S%G71><s%> him to the apostles, <S%G652><s%> and declared <S%G1334><s%> to them how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in the way, <S%G3598><s%> and that he had spoken <S%G2980><s%> to him, and how <S%G4459><s%> he had preached <S%G3954><s%> boldly <S%G3955><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And he was with them coming <S%G1531><s%> in and going <S%G1607><s%> out at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

Which when the brothers <S%G80><s%> knew, <S%G1921><s%> they brought <S%G2609><s%> him down <S%G2609><s%> to Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> and sent <S%G1821><s%> him forth <S%G1821><s%> to Tarsus. <S%G5019><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> rest <S%G1515><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> and Galilee <S%G1056><s%> and Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> and were edified; <S%G3618><s%> and walking <S%G4198><s%> in the fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and in the comfort <S%G3874><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> were multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> that dwelled <S%G2730><s%> at Lydda <S%G3069><s%> and Saron <S%G4565><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, and turned <S%G1994><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there was at <S%G1722><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> disciple <S%G3102><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Tabitha, <S%G5000><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> by interpretation <S%G1329><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Dorcas: <S%G1393><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman was full <S%G4134><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> and giving of alms <S%G1654><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> she did. <S%G4160><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass in those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that she was sick, <S%G770><s%> and died: <S%G599><s%> whom when they had washed, <S%G3068><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> her in an upper <S%G5253><s%> chamber. <S%G5253><s%>

And for as much <S%G5607><s%> as Lydda <S%G3069><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> to Joppa, <S%G2445><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> that Peter <S%G4074><s%> was there, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> they sent <S%G649><s%> to him two <S%G1417><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> desiring <S%G3870><s%> him that he would not delay <S%G3635><s%> to come <S%G1330><s%> to them.
